Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1055.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Hello there. Are you waiting for someone?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Hmm... Yes? Can I help you?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Oh, I'm Yata. I'm a first-year student, too.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'May I know your name?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Nice to meet you. I'm Yuka Saotome.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: "Yata's Father", 3: "You're a Saotome?", 4: '1'}
{2: "Yata's Father", 3: 'Could you be the daughter of the renowned Dr. Saotome?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'What are you talking about, Dad?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I believe I know who you're referring to.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I'm not her daughter though, I'm just a student boarding at Dr. Saotome's...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: "Yata's Father", 3: 'Ah, I see. And here I was sure you were her daughter.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Yata's Father", 3: 'Well, Dr. Saotome is a brilliant scientist, and anyone bearing that name tends to be exceptional as well.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "You're too kind.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Dad, why don't you step aside? Yuka and I can look around on our own.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: "Yata's Father", 3: "Haha, I'll leave you two to yourselves then.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Yata's Father", 3: 'Hey, Yata, be nice to Yuka, yeah?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Yeah, yeah, whatever.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Come on... Wanna check out the shops nearby?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Eh? Um...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I'll do whatever you want to do, Yata.", 4: '2'}
